title: army
description: Defines a distinct army type, from which single entity instances are generated in game.

health.description: How many successful attacks can this unit suffer before dying?

instanceName.description: Unique name for the unit, like "Vorgoth the Timid, Destroyer of Lint Bunnies"

name.description: Descriptive, unique name for this type of army.

statuses.description: Longer term affects inflicted on this unit.

strength.description: Base, unmodified attack/defense strength of the unit.
